column5: Big 1 bed / 1 bath apartment in one of the best parts of Houston (River Oaks).  Easy access to downtown or the Galleria with a 10 minute bus from the front of the building. Easy access to I-59, I-10, I-610, and NRG Stadium (15 min Uber / drive or 30 mins with public transportation).   Walking distance from a Whole Foods & Trader Joes, acclaimed restaurants (Paulie's, Hugo's, Common Bond, Underbelly, Uchi, Local Foods, Ruggles Green) nightlife (Owl Bar, Ice House, Kirby Ice House, Anvil).
column8: 1 bedroom spacious apartment at the heart of town
